titles.title: Come and See Look on This Mystery

comments.comment:
ending(maybe)
[above are Song Tags with notes imported from EasyWorship]

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Em
Come and see look on this mystery
The Lord of the universe nailed to a tree
Christ our God spilling His holy blood
Bowing in anguish His sacred head

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Sing to Jesus - Lord of our shame
Lord of our sinful hearts
He is our great redeemer
Sing to Jesus - Honor His name
Sing of His faithfulness
Pouring His life out unto death

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Come - you will - and He will give you rest
Come you who mourn - lay on His breast
Christ who died risen in paradise
Giver of mercy
Giver of life

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Sing to Jesus - His is the throne
Now and forever - He is the King of Heaven
Sing to Jesus - we are His own
Now and forever
Sing for the love our God has shown
